name: Giant Sea Horse

trait.name: Charge
text: If the sea horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Water Breathing
text: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Ram
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

description:
Like their smaller kin, giant sea horses are shy, colorful fish with elongated bodies and curled tails. Aquatic elves train them as mounts.
Source: Monster Manual p. 328, Ghosts of Saltmarsh
